name: Le Temple perdu de l'oncle Ernest
summary: You and your Companion Chipikan follow the trails of Uncle Albert, a great adventurer who discovered a secret in the rainforests of South America. By solving riddles, completing tasks and navigating through the notebook of Unlce Albert, which is also the stage for the entire game, you learn about the flora and fauna of Peru as well as the culture and lands of other South American countries.
